attributes.action: Clear labelling of fructose on processed and packaged foods
attributes.additional_details:
Fructose is a chronic toxin, metabolized only by the liver and responsible for insulin resistance—the common denominator in Metabolic Syndrome, Type 2 Diabetes and Obesity. It is also believed that a link exists between Metabolic Syndrome and cancer.

Excessive fructose intake is making us obese and sick.

The intent of this petition is to give UK the consumer clear information about how much fructose is in the food they eat by way of listing fructose as a distinct item of nutritional information instead of grouping it with total sugars. This is necessary because fructose is metabolised differently to other sugars and has long term toxic effects.
